comments.en:
The Oki C301dn is a networked color laser printer with a 2012 street price of $400 USD. This printer is supported by the foo2hiperc open software printer driver.

Consumables: Separate toner cartridges black (2200 prints, ~$32), yellow/magenta/cyan (1500 prints, ~$65 each), transfer belt (60000 prints, ~$78), fuser unit (60000 prints, ~$78), image drum (30000/20000 prints, ~$160)
